name: HEADACHE (itch) (MELTPACK)
description:
HEADACHE is a eyeburning, high-octane Hotline-Miami style FPS where you use anything and everything you can to brutalise everybody in the level as fast as possible. Blast, stomp, and smash your way through a office-disguised gang hideout to take down the leader. Stomp heads, crack skulls, and smash doors in a brilliant die-and-retry loop to rack up the highest combo, and the highest score possible.

CONTROLS:

WASD, MOUSE - Move, look around

M1 - Use weapon

M2 - Pick up/Throw weapon (based on whether you are holding a weapon already.

E - Kick

SPACE - Dash (you'll need it)

Note: This game is a demo/concept game. The challenges that go into creating a FPS Hotline Miami were ones I could not have foreseen. I may return to this in the future, but until I can figure out new concepts and ideas for it, it'll sit here. If you'd like to share clips, give feedback or even help out designing the game, join the Discord!
